find_path(SPARKLE_INCLUDE_DIR
  NAMES Sparkle/Sparkle.h
  PATHS ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Pods/Sparkle
)
add_library(Sparkle::Sparkle SHARED IMPORTED GLOBAL)
set_target_properties(Sparkle::Sparkle
  PROPERTIES
    FRAMEWORK ON
    IMPORTED_LOCATION ${SPARKLE_INCLUDE_DIR}/Sparkle
    INTERFACE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES ${SPARKLE_INCLUDE_DIR}
)
